title: Ep. 505 - Joe-mentum
description:
Joe Biden turns around a flailing presidential campaign with a massive showing on Super Tuesday. Whereas last week Joe was dead, both figuratively and literally, now he is only dead literally. We will examine what the establishment comeback means for the Democratic primary and for the general election. Then, the media are shocked a Hispanic could vote for Trump, disgraced throuple congresswoman Katie Hill teaches us all a lesson on selfishness, and Taylor Swift hates men.

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
